title: Rads Error
body: I have tried everything i could find to try and fix it but it still wont work. It has been a week and i really want to play.

replies.body: iirc, RADS errors are usually fixed by setting up your permissions. Check out this article for troubleshooting; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions

This is correct, RADS errors are generally caused by the client not having the right system permissions to run properly. This guide goes over the most common solutions, so I'm confident those steps will help.

Let me know if you still have issues after taking those steps.
